title: Court grants police time for identification parade of PTI activist
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 09 (APP):An Anti-Terrorism Court (ATC) on Wednesday granted the police two-day time for identification parade of PTI social media activist Haider Saeed.
ATC Judge Tahir Abbas Supra heard the case. During the hearing, the court was told that Haider Saeedâ€™s identity parade could not be completed.
The investigating officer requested the court to grant a two-day postponement for identity parade. The court accepted the request and adjourned further hearing of the case. Haider Saeed will be presented in court after the identity parade on April 11.
The court sent the accused to jail for 14 days for the identity parade.
